scripts.frontend:dev:local: cd frontend && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_RPC_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8545/ NEXT_PUBLIC_CHAIN_ID=31337 npm run dev
scripts.frontend:dev:somnia: cd frontend && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_RPC_URL=https://dream-rpc.somnia.network/ NEXT_PUBLIC_CHAIN_ID=50311 npm run dev
scripts.bc:deploy:contract:local: rm -rf ignition/deployments && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/carve.ts --network localhost
scripts.bc:deploy:contract:somnia: rm -rf ignition/deployments && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/carve.ts --network somnia
